title: Strategy Lead - Mexico
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just build products — they build the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. Join Apple and help us leave the world better than we found it! Apple’s Sales organization generates the revenue needed to fuel our ongoing development of products and services. The Strategy Analyst will conduct in-depth research, analyze data, and provide valuable insights to drive business growth, improve operational efficiency, and maintain a competitive edge in the market.
description:
-  Conduct extensive market research, competitor analysis, and industry trends evaluation to identify emerging opportunities and risks.
-  Collect, analyze, and interpret large datasets to extract key insights to drive strategic decision-making. Develop and maintain deep industry understanding including market dynamics, customer preferences, and regulatory landscape.
-  Collaborate with several teams to develop and refine strategic objectives and long-term business plans, ensuring alignment with organizational goals.
-  Support the development of business cases by conducting feasibility studies and evaluating potential partnerships. Report and present progress and insights to partners and senior management.
-  Establish key performance indicators and metrics to track the progress and effectiveness of strategic initiatives, identifying areas for improvement and recommending corrective actions.
preferred_qualifications:
Master's degree
Proficiency in SQL, Python or Tableau
Ability to work both independently and collaboratively, build influential relationships across structures
The highest level of integrity, honesty, and accountability in all that you do, every single day
